tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    physical_count INT,
    recorded_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE physical_inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    physical_count INT,
    recorded_count INT,
    discrepancy_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE loss_investigation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    investigation_date DATE,
    investigation_notes TEXT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_counts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  physical_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_data (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date_recorded DATE,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE discrepancies (
  discrepancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  discrepancy_type VARCHAR(50),
  reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  discrepancy_id INT,
  investigator_id INT,
  investigation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigators (
  investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100)
)
